model

Class IntermediateAIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Player
        • model.IntermediateAIPlayer

  • public class IntermediateAIPlayer
extends Player
    More intelligent than Simple AI Strategy: randomly places first in a territory, then add other troops in adjacent territories. Only attack the fewest amount of enemy troops.
    Author:
    Steven Broussard, Elizabeth Harris, Jeremy Jalnos, Becca Simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new IntermediateAIPlayer object with the player's name set to the parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • placeArmy

        public void placeArmy()
        Description copied from class: Player
        During the start of the game, choose a territory in which to claim, then place remaining armies. During turns, place armies until all armies for that turn are placed. Each time you place only one army.
        Specified by:
        placeArmy in class Player

      • attackFrom

        public Territory attackFrom()
        Chooses a territory to attack from. Prefers territories next to enemy territories with fewer armies than its own.
        Specified by:
        attackFrom in class Player
        Returns:
        Territory

      • attackTo

        public Territory attackTo(Territory attackFrom)
        Chooses a territory to attack. If this has already been set by attackFrom, returns the territory chosen by attackFrom; otherwise, chooses the enemy territory adjacent to the parameter with the least armies. Ends the turn after seven attacks.
        Specified by:
        attackTo in class Player
        Parameters:
        attackFrom -
        Returns:
        Territory

      • reinforceArmies

        public void reinforceArmies()
        Moves armies away from interior territories (territories with all adjacent territories owned by the current player). Finds a territory with more than one army, determines if it's possible to reinforce, chooses an adjacent territory with a lower number of armies, and moves all but one army to that territory.
        Specified by:
        reinforceArmies in class Player
        Parameters:
        takeArmy, - reinforceThis
